attributes.action: Change the road building policy immediately, and replace with massive bicycle track and small scale tram networks in and around all towns, cities and country side.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To seriously tackle greenhouse gas emissions, we have to change the way we live our lives and how we get around.
Transport is a key issue in this,we are addicted to our own safe fast moving cars, but we have no choices at present, as the roads are far too dangerous to ride on. We have to make our towns and countryside bicycle friendly, low impact on the environment and 0 on emmisions. It will change our way of life with one sweep, and leave an incredible legacy for the people of the future. Disabled and the elderly need help also, so small scale tram lines need to be built along all bicycle tracks.
Please sign today.
Wendy Vickerman
School Principle of Montessori Eco School
